parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Executes [[else]] code when [[if]] condition returns [[false]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> ifCode '''else''' elseCode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ifCode: [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> elseCode: [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (a > b) [[then]] { c = 0 } [[else]] { c = 1 };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (a < b) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "B is greater than A";
} [[else]] {
    [[hint]] "A is greater than B";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Control Structures]], [[if]], [[then]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
